ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(New_Home_Approval_Type__c , 'Regular Home Approval') ,OR(ISCHANGED( Ability_of_the_family_to_meet_needs__c ), ISCHANGED( Family_s_ability_to_resolve_conflict__c ) , ISCHANGED( Family_s_ability_to_work_as_a_team__c ), ISCHANGED( Summary_of_child_s_past_experience__c ), ISCHANGED( Family_s_ability_to_meet_child_s_need__c ), ISCHANGED( Applicant_s_supervision_and_assure__c ) , ISCHANGED(Description__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the New Home Approval Type is 'Regular Home Approval' You are not suppose to edit Family Content
